evidence.text: Person A: Please make it work.

Person B: Hello mom… No, we are at the tailor’s, it's not bad, it only looked a bit puffy on her shoulders, but she’ll fix it… No, we'll be there in an hour, an hour and a half… Ok... do you remember Sadaf is also with Sana and me… but I told you last week…
Person B: What do you mean Mom? First of all, I told you beforehand. Besides that, Sadaf came from her town and her dorm is not ready yet. She doesn’t have anyone here. You agreed in advance and told her she could stay the night at our place.
Person B: Mom, are you plucking my eyebrows for real? I don't feel anything.

Person A: Let me make you pretty...Rezvan...Does your mom hate me?
Person A: Don't you see that she is constantly throwing shades at me?
Person B: can't you hear it? Listen!

Person A: See how many files I’ve sent. Go and watch them.
Person B: Everything has been filtered since this evening though.
Person A: I will send you a VPN now.
Person A: Hello Auntie, hello Rezvan.
Person A: Sadaf, you were talking to your mom, are there protests there as well?
Person B: Go back to the bedroom, Sadaf.
